phrases: Piercing through the Macro sky,
a thunderbolt strikes the Earth
To awaken us, the young mankind,
the Light struck
Macross!
Macross!
The brave youths who arise
and fight to protect their loved ones
will set out on their journey as the war rages on
Will you love me tomorrow?
Slicing through the darkness, they fly toward
that blue planet that shines in the distance
Macross!
Macross!
Macross!
The Macross, which launched in haste in order to avoid an enemy attack,
failed in its attempt to execute a space fold to the far side of the Moon.
Instead, the Macross and its island base were transported not to the Moon,
but just inside the orbit of Pluto.
Daedulus, respond!
Air leaks at each block confirmed!
Service personnel, please stand by!
Bringing in the shelters is our first priority.
That is where the evacuees from the city are!
Captain, we cannot contact the Prometheus or the Daedalus.
The chances of finding any survivors are...
I thought as much.
They are just aircraft carriers.
They were not designed to fly into space.
Hayase, issue an order to the work vessels.
Tell them to pull the carriers here toward us.
Do not tell me you are going to dock with them instead of ARMD-I and ARMD-II!
We should be able to use their ship-based weapons.
I wonder if it will work?
I am counting on the efforts of the work teams.
Once we have retrieved the people from the shelters,
we are going to round up everything that is floating around out there.
Hikaru Ichijo, the air-race pilot who came to see
the launching of the Macross only to find himself in the middle of a war,
and Lynn Minmay, the young girl that he rescued,
narrowly escaped death by flying inside the Macross itself.
However...
LYNN MINMAY
Here goes.
Come on, why do not you give up on that?
It will be faster just to call someone to come get us, right?
What is it?
The communicator's busted.
What is that?
A compass.
I thought a compass was shaped like this.
So, it is not the kind of compass you draw circles with.
This ship is huge.
With this, we will always know where the racer is.
There is nothing but pipes everywhere!
I wonder, if it is because we are near the energy block?
Hot!
I am fine.
See?
It was just a little hot, that is all.
You will get hurt if you are not careful.
Okay.
Hey, be careful!
Fourth time's not a charm either, huh?
Are you sure we are not going the wrong way?
We should be heading toward the bridge, but...
This is the right way.
It has to be.
Let us go?
Yep.
You want us to look for a civilian?
Yeah, his name's Hikaru Ichijo, remember?
He is like my little brother.
Now, look here!
There is a time and place for jokes, and...
Claudia...
Major Focker, this is Captain Global.
I think you are already aware
that there are currently over 50,000 civilians taking shelter aboard this ship.
If the enemy were to launch a surprise attack, there is no telling...
Understood, sir!
The lives of 50,000 people are more important than the life of just one, right?!
Well, you see...
Blockhead...
Hey, does it look brighter over there to you?
You are right!
We did it!
We did it!
It looks like we can climb up over there!
An airlock for the giants, huh?
What is wrong?!
What on earth is going on?
Maybe, we are having a bad dream.
The captain is currently inspecting the ship.
Over.
I made some coffee.
I swear, and all because the Captain had to execute a space fold.
Not only can our ship not make contact with the Earth,
now we have these 50,000 civilian refugees.
If we are attacked out here, we are done for.
But, even without fold communication, given enough time, normal radio waves should...
Right, we could still make contact with UN High Command.
But that would reveal our location to the enemy.
Oh...
1st Lt. Hayase, block RX-24 is requesting directions to an evacuation center.
We do not even have time for a cup of coffee.
How is your leg?
Does it still hurt?
My leg's fine, but I am really thirsty.
Water, huh?
If it was food, there is a little back at the racer, but...
You may be able to drink some water after all!
Hang on a second!
Ready, okay!
It tastes great!
And it feels great!
Hey!
I think I will take a shower!
Huh?
Right now?
Here?
Yup, I am all covered in sweat.
Well, I guess it would be better if I go over there, huh?
Thank you for being so considerate.
You have made me happy.
Also, if you could set up a screen over there, I would appreciate it.
Aye, aye.
Is this okay?
Thanks!
What is it, Minmay?!
Huh?
Really...
Jeez...
Maybe I teased him a little too much.
Sorry, Hikaru!
Hikaru, what is it?
Are you mad?
Hikaru!
Answer me!
I found my work clothes.
You can wear them if you like.
I feel so much better!
Why do not you take a shower, too?
Sure, I was going to.
This shirt is so baggy!
I found some canned food too.
You want some?
Terrific!
Man, I sure am hungry.
Yum!
This is great!
Hey, are you sure you should eat that all at once?
No problem!
We will find the exit tomorrow.
And, if we do not?
This ship's only about a kilometer long at most.
I think we will be fine.
But, look at all the walking we just did, and it did not get us anywhere!
Which is why tomorrow, I will make a map and...
I have lost my appetite.
Beaten already, huh?
Who is?
If you think about it, it is only been one day.
Yeah, I got a call from my Sempai and I came out to see the Macross.
The next thing I know, not only am I being attacked by aliens,...
but I wind up in space inside the ship.
I wonder how my aunt and uncle are doing?
If they made it to the shelter, I think they will be fine.
Yeah, the soldiers will protect them.
The soldiers, huh?
Hey, that is not such a good idea!
If you fall asleep in a place like this, you will catch a cold.
Oh, so that is the kind of person you are.
I had no idea!
Unbelievable!
Hey, wait a minute!
It was a rat!
Rats!
What did I tell you?
It is a ship, so they made this their home long before us humans.
I cannot stand rats!
Hurry up and make them go away!
Hey, I wonder if that is their nest?
Oh, no!
I will explain the situation to them tomorrow and get them to share the bed with you.
Now, if we are here, then...
Hey!
This shows that this is our second day as castaways.
Good idea, huh?
Uh, sure.
Well, I will be back later.
See you!
How could she do that to my precious racer?!
Jeez...
Ow!
Ow!
How did it go?
That sure smells good!
Our food will last longer this way.
Just what you would expect from a girl whose family runs a Chinese restaurant!
No way!
That is my aunt's place.
I just go there to visit sometimes.
Where is your family then?
Yokohama...
We have a restaurant in Chinatown.
Here!
Oh, I would just assumed that your family ran a Chinese restaurant...
Huh?!
Today's our third day, huh?
Mom...
I give up.
It is like we are on some desert island in a far-off sea.
Oh?
But, this is the last of our supplies.
Why do not I go outside and call for help?
Outside?
I will go out into space through the airlock, then back onto the ship through another one.
But, you do not have a spacesuit!
They use this helmet in combat, so it is pretty airtight.
If we reinforce it, I think we can make this work.
But...
With it and this pilot suit, I should be able to last for a while.
But...
Do you understand how to work the switch now?
Yes...
But, what will you do for air?
You do not even have an oxygen tank.
I think I can hold out for two or three minutes.
You are going to hold your breath?!
It is no different from diving in the ocean, right?
Where are you going?
To check the direction of the nearest airlock from the window.
Again?
You cannot get spooked by every little thing that floats by, okay?
Is that a tuna?
A tuna?
A tuna!
Tuna!
Sashimi!
Hang in there!
Are you all right?
I did it!
We will not be worrying about food for a...
You should not be so disappointed.
Not many people have ever caught a tuna in space.
But, now I cannot go back out there again.
When I was pinned under the tuna, my suit got snagged on its teeth.
Our plan of going outside the ship to get help just went up in smoke.
Hey, how about opening a hole in the ceiling and going up?
I thought of that, too...
But, where are we going to get tools to cut through steel plates?
What about blasting through?
We have just about used up the rest of the racer's fuel.
On what?
That.
Thanks.
So I told him, it does not matter how many fighter planes you have,
without pilots, what are ya going to do?
Good work.
So, how are the refugees holding up?
I hear they have calmed down a bit and have started building a refugee camp.
A refugee camp?
Really?
When the midnight bell tolled, the magic spell wore off.
Down the staircase she rushed, as if trying to outrun it.
And at the top of the stairs, a single glass slipper...
You have got a nice voice.
You may not believe it, but I took singing lessons in middle school.
And dancing... and acting lessons too!
You sure have done a lot.
I have just flown planes my whole life.
Oh, but that is great!
Putting everything you have got into just one thing.
You think so?
So what do you want to be?
Me? Oh...
A bride, I guess.
A bride?
I see.
Well, I bet you will make a great one.
Thanks...
But, it is all over for us anyway.
Hey, that is not true!
My Sempai and the others will find us.
It is been twelve days now.
They will have given us up for dead.
Even my aunt and uncle...
We will make a good dinner for the rats when we die, huh?
Just like that tuna did.
Do not say things like that.
It is okay.
But I just...
I wish I could have worn a wedding dress just once before I died.
Minmay...
What do you say we have a wedding ceremony?
You are right.
That would be great!
I... Are you sure you are okay with someone like me?
Say, Hikaru...
If we are going to die anyway, let us get it over with...
and throw ourselves out into space!
Where did that come from?
Let us die together!
Do not be stupid!
You fell from the sky and drifted in space, but you are still alive!
You will be saved this time too!
I promise!
Sure, you say that, but...
We cannot find a single way out of here!
You are just scared to die!
Coward!
I guess I am kind of pathetic.
I am just a guy who only knows how to fly planes, but...
But, I...
You make me...
I am sorry.
I did not mean it like that.
I guess I got a little crazy for a second.
An enemy missile!
It is a dud!
We have got to get rid of it quick!
It is dangerous!
Hey, is not that Minmay?
Mr. Mayor!
They say they found some people!
Huh?!
A boy and a girl!
You have got to be kiddin' me!
Hey, you are right!
How?!
We are inside a spaceship, but...
Wow!
Amazing!
The restaurant and Yot-chan's house are just like they were!
Hey!
Minmay!
Yot-chan!
I do not really get it myself, but since leavin' the town out in space
would be a waste, and seeing as how there is all this empty space on-board,
they decided to just bring everything onto the ship!
Hey, there!
You are Hikaru, then?
I hear you took good care of our Minmay!
Oh, uh, not at all!
Without her help, I would have...
Thank ya!
Thank ya!
Oh, it was awful!
This is the bridge.
The attack just now was a chance encounter with two small enemy ships.
A Valkyrie squadron has intercepted and destroyed the enemy vessels,
and we have incurred minimal damage.
We are hereby sounding the all-clear.
That is all.
This has got to be a nightmare.
Oh, it is a nightmare all right.
But do not let it get ya down!
Hey, what is wrong?
Pull yourself together!
He cannot!
He has not even been eating!
Poor kid!
He was indeed hungry, and shocked by the appearance of the ship's interior.
But to Hikaru, what was most unbelievable was Minmay's sudden change in attitude.
Lynn Minmay: Just what kind of girl is she?
With 50,000 refugees aboard,
the Macross prepares to leave Pluto's orbit and return to Earth.
Inside the Macross, the city's streets are being restored,
and Hikaru is confused by the sudden changes in Minmay.
When a scout vessel from the enemy fleet detects the Macross,
a desperate plan is conceived to compensate for the loss of the Fold System.
But can it succeed?
TRANSFORMATION
I will not follow it anymore,
the shadow you cast as you run away
We all keep running until the end,
but we still cannot see the goal
What awaits us after today?
What awaits us beyond tomorrow?
Even now, I keep running toward
The light that shines so far away
